scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.postinstall: pip install pymongo selenium python-dotenv python-dateutil && curl -o chromedriver-linux64.zip https://storage.googleapis.com/chrome-for-testing-public/131.0.6778.204/linux64/chromedriver-linux64.zip && unzip chromedriver-linux64.zip && mv chromedriver-linux64/chromedriver /usr/local/bin/chromedriver && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/chromedriver
